name: r1ord
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cfv(cr1, c1), cfv(cr1, c0))))

stmt.origin: sylbir(wcel(c0, con0), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cfv(cr1, c1), cfv(cr1, c0))), wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)))
stmt.pretty: sylbir(c0 ∈ On, (c1 ∈ c0 →(R1 ` c1)∈(R1 ` c0)), c0 ∈ dom(R1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cfv(cr1, c1), cfv(cr1, c0))))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wcel(c0, con0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cfv(cr1, c1), cfv(cr1, c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cfv(cr1, c1), cfv(cr1, c0))))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wcel(c0, con0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cfv(cr1, c1), cfv(cr1, c0))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wcel(c0, con0))
-| wceq(cdm(cr1), con0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cfv(cr1, c1), cfv(cr1, c0))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cfv(cr1, c1), cfv(cr1, c0))))
-| wceq(cdm(cr1), con0)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cdm(cr1), con0)
-| wfn(cr1, con0)
-| wi(wfn(cr1, con0), wceq(cdm(cr1), con0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cfv(cr1, c1), cfv(cr1, c0))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cfv(cr1, c1), cfv(cr1, c0))))
-| wfn(cr1, con0)
-| wi(wfn(cr1, con0), wceq(cdm(cr1), con0))

|- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cfv(cr1, c1), cfv(cr1, c0))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cfv(cr1, c1), cfv(cr1, c0))))
-| wi(wfn(cr1, con0), wceq(cdm(cr1), con0))

|- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cfv(cr1, c1), cfv(cr1, c0))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cfv(cr1, c1), cfv(cr1, c0))))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cfv(cr1, c1), cfv(cr1, c0))))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cfv(cr1, c1), cfv(cr1, c0))))

comment: Ordering relation for the cumulative hierarchy of sets. Part of Proposition 9.10(2) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 77. (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2014.)
